verses.verse: In the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> on the <S%H259>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> by the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> to <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7597>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and to <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3541>"Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2088>'This<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> "The <S%H6256>time<s%> has not <S%H935>come,<s%> [even] the <S%H6256>time<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to be <S%H1129>rebuilt.<s%> "'"
Then the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> by <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Is it <S%H6256>time<s%> for you <S%H9043>yourselves<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in your <S%H5603>paneled<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> while <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> [lies] <S%H2720>desolate<s%>?"

"You have <S%H2232>sown<s%> <S%H7235>much,<s%> but <S%H935>harvest<s%> <S%H4592>little;<s%> [you] <S%H398>eat,<s%> but [there is] not [enough] to be <S%H7654>satisfied;<s%> [you] <S%H8354>drink,<s%> but [there is] not [enough] to <S%H7937>become<s%> <S%H7937>drunk;<s%> [you] <S%H3847>put<s%> on <S%H3847>clothing,<s%> but <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> is <S%H2552>warm<s%> [enough]; and he who <S%H7936>earns,<s%> <S%H7936>earns<s%> <S%H7939>wages<s%> [to put] into a <S%H6872>purse<s%> with <S%H9344>holes.<s%>"

<S%H5927>"Go<s%> up to the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H1129>rebuild<s%> the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> that I may be <S%H7521>pleased<s%> with it and be <S%H3513>glorified,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"[You] <S%H6437>look<s%> for <S%H7235>much,<s%> but <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [it comes] to <S%H4592>little;<s%> when you <S%H935>bring<s%> [it] <S%H1004>home,<s%> I <S%H5301>blow<s%> it [away.] <S%H3282>Why<s%> <S%H4100><s%>?" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3282>"Because<s%> of My <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> [lies] <S%H2720>desolate,<s%> while <S%H376>each<s%> of you <S%H7323>runs<s%> to his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H5921>"Therefore,<s%> <S%H3651><s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> of you the <S%H8064>sky<s%> has <S%H3607>withheld<s%> its <S%H2919>dew,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> has <S%H3607>withheld<s%> its <S%H2981>produce.<s%>

"And I <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H2721>drought<s%> on the <S%H776>land,<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> on the <S%H1715>grain,<s%> on the <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> on the <S%H3323>oil,<s%> on <S%H834>what<s%> the <S%H127>ground<s%> <S%H3318>produces,<s%> on <S%H120>men,<s%> on <S%H929>cattle,<s%> and on <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3018>labor<s%> of your <S%H3709>hands.<s%>"

Then <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9611>Shealtiel,<s%> and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> and the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H2292>Haggai<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> him. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3372>showed<s%> <S%H3372>reverence<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

Then <S%H2292>Haggai,<s%> the <S%H4397>messenger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> by the <S%H4400>commission<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> to the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "'I am with you,' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

So the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5782>stirred<s%> up the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2216>Zerubbabel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H9611>Shealtiel,<s%> <S%H6346>governor<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3087>Jehozadak,<s%> the <S%H1419>high<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H5971>people;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H6213>worked<s%> on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> their <S%H430>God,<s%>
on the twenty-fourth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> in the <S%H8147>second<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H1867>Darius<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
